StringValues.18: You are enveloped in a feeling of warmth as you are brought back protection of Light.
StringValues.22: A calm, patient silence reminds you that you already walk in the grace of Light.
StringValues.15: Praying before this memorial will bring one back into the grace of Light, as a Non-Player Killer protected by Asheron's magic. The supplicant may not have killed anyone for three hours beforehand.
StringValues.7: Our blessed Lady's mortal form fell in defeating the Enemy. This tomb remains empty in her name.
